00013 class Plugins_Facebook_DB extends Common_DB
00014 {
00015     static protected $_message;
00016     
00017     /**
00018      * @return void
00019      */
00020     function __construct()
00021     {
00022         parent::__construct();
00023     }
00024 
00025     /**
00026      * @param array $data
00027      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00028      * @param string $src
00029      * @return Message_Data
00030      */
00031     public static function save(array $data, $account, $src = "home")
00032     {
00033 
00034         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00035         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00036 
00037         $msgIds = array();
00038 
00039         foreach ($data as $item) {
00040 
00041             self::$_message = new Message_Data();
00042             self::$_message->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00043                     ->setIdUP($account->getId())
00044                     ->setRemoteId($item->id);
00045 
00046             $existingMessages = $messageMapper->find(self::$_message);
00047 
00048             if (count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00049 
00050                 self::$_message = array_shift($existingMessages);
00051             }
00052 
00053             $item->created_time = substr($item->created_time, 0, strpos($item->created_time, "+"));
00054             self::$_message->setPublishDate(str_replace("T", " ", $item->created_time));
00055 
00056             $owner = $item->from->id == $account->getMetadata("id") ? "1" : "0";
00057             self::$_message->setOwner($owner);
00058 
00059             switch ($item->type) {
00060 
00061                 case "link":
00062 
00063                     self::$_message->setLink($item->link);
00064                     self::$_message->setTitle($item->name);
00065 
00066                     $data = array(
00067                         "text" => isset($item->message) ? $item->message : false,
00068                         "description" => isset($item->description) ? $item->description : false,
00069                         "from" => $item->from,
00070                         "actions" => $item->actions,
00071                         "type" => $item->type,
00072                         "picture" => isset($item->picture) ? $item->picture : false,
00073                         "likes" => isset($item->likes->count) ? $item->likes->count : 0,
00074                         "comments" => isset($item->comments->count) ? $item->comments->count : 0,
00075                     );
00076 
00077                     break;
00078 
00079                 case "photo":
00080 
00081                     self::$_message->setLink($item->link);
00082 
00083                     if (isset($item->name)) {
00084 
00085                         self::$_message->setTitle($item->name);
00086 
00087                     } else if (isset($item->message)) {
00088 
00089                         self::$_message->setTitle($item->message);
00090                     }
00091 
00092                     $data = array(
00093                         "from" => $item->from,
00094                         "type" => $item->type,
00095                         "likes" => isset($item->likes->count) ? $item->likes->count : 0,
00096                         "comments" => isset($item->comments->count) ? $item->comments->count : 0,
00097                         "properties" => isset($item->properties[0]) ? $item->properties[0] : false,
00098                         "picture" => isset($item->picture) ? $item->picture : false,
00099                         "text" => isset($item->caption) ? $item->caption : false,
00100                     );
00101 
00102                     break;
00103 
00104                 case "status":
00105 
00106                     self::$_message->setLink("#");
00107 
00108                     if (isset($item->message) ){
00109 
00110                        self::$_message->setTitle($item->message);
00111 
00112                     } else if (isset($item->caption)) {
00113 
00114                         self::$_message->setTitle($item->caption);
00115 
00116                     } else {
00117 
00118                         //print_r($item);
00119                         continue;
00120                     }
00121 
00122                     $data = array(
00123                         "from" => $item->from,
00124                         "actions" => $item->actions,
00125                         "type" => $item->type,
00126                         "likes" => isset($item->likes->count) ? $item->likes->count : 0,
00127                         "comments" => isset($item->comments->count) ? $item->comments->count : 0,
00128                     );
00129 
00130                     break;
00131 
00132                 case "video":
00133 
00134                     self::$_message->setLink($item->link);
00135                     if (isset($item->message)) {
00136 
00137                         self::$_message->setTitle($item->message);
00138                     }
00139 
00140                     $data = array(
00141                         "from" => $item->from,
00142                         "actions" => $item->actions,
00143                         "type" => $item->type,
00144                         "likes" => isset($item->likes->count) ? $item->likes->count : 0,
00145                         "comments" => isset($item->comments->count) ? $item->comments->count : 0,
00146                         //"title" => isset($item->message) ? $item->message : false,
00147                         "text" => isset($item->description) ? $item->description : false,
00148                         "picture" => isset($item->picture) ? $item->picture : false
00149                     );
00150 
00151                     break;
00152 
00153                 default:
00154 
00155                     echo "unknow message type --> ".$item->type."\r\n";
00156                     break;
00157             }
00158 
00159             if ($data["likes"] > 0 and isset($item->likes->data)) {
00160 
00161                 $data["whoLikes"] = $item->likes->data;
00162             }
00163             
00164             if ($data["comments"] > 0 and isset($item->comments->data)) {
00165 
00166                 $data["msgComments"] = $item->comments->data;
00167             }
00168             
00169             self::$_message->setData($data);
00170 
00171             $data = array_merge(array("src" => $src), self::$_message->getData());
00172             self::$_message->setData($data);
00173 
00174             if (self::$_message->isValid()) {
00175 
00176                 self::$_message->getRemoteId();
00177                 $msgIds[] = $messageMapper->save(self::$_message);
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         if (self::$_message instanceof Message_Data) {
00182 
00183            /***
00184             * Borrar mensajes eliminados en facebook
00185             */
00186             $where = array(
00187                 "where" => array(
00188                     //"messages.owner" => self::$_message->getOwner(),
00189                     "messages.id >" => $msgIds[count($msgIds)-1],
00190                     "idup" => self::$_message->getIdUP()
00191                 ),
00192 
00193                 "where_not_in" => array(
00194                     "messages.id" => $msgIds
00195                 ),
00196 
00197                 "like" => array(
00198                     "data" => 's:3:"src";s:'.strlen($src).':"'.$src.'";'
00199                 )
00200             );
00201 
00202             $messages = $messageMapper->customQuery($where);
00203 
00204             foreach ($messages as $msg) {
00205 
00206                 echo "Deleting facebook message with id: ".$msg->getId()." and remoteId: ".$msg->getRemoteId()."<br />\r\n";
00207                 $messageMapper->delete($msg);
00208             }
00209         }
00210  
00211         return self::$_message;
00212     }
00213 }
